content.text:
wat

Turns out that my /notifications work fine when I'm mentioned, but I could've *sworn* there was some new functionality to create notifications when people directly replied to your post (e.g. %xoNYusQ8AKugyhjX4xkefEVLjZeP8i55tgId1oEZc3I=.sha256) even without a mention. Maybe I misunderstood? I feel like I need a sanity check here.

Tagging some friends who I know use Patchbay: [@arj](@6CAxOI3f+LUOVrbAl0IemqiS7ATpQvr9Mdw9LC4+Uv0=.ed25519) [@dan hassan](@NeB4q4Hy9IiMxs5L08oevEhivxW+/aDu/s/0SkNayi0=.ed25519) [@cryptix](@p13zSAiOpguI9nsawkGijsnMfWmFd5rlUNpzekEE+vI=.ed25519)
